name: Everything Dies
description:
You boot up your computer hoping to play that old game you remember being so weird and cool. Unfortunately, the game is no longer compatible with your PC and is being removed.

"Everything Dies" is a 3-minute-long thing about the end of a world, because everything dies, even if it's made of 0s and 1s.

---

Made in a couple of hours for #dreamhackjam.

Game by Ludipe with music by Visager.

Play using your arrow keys.
